App Name: Heart Rate Health & BP Monitor

Package Name: com.ratemeasure.heart

Brief:

The Heart Rate Health & BP Monitor app is designed to offer individuals an easy-to-use, comprehensive solution for tracking and understanding heart rate and blood pressure. Leveraging the convenience of your smartphone camera or connected smartwatch, it enables the monitoring of vital health metrics, helping users recognize patterns and make informed lifestyle choices to improve their health.
